title: Raddagher's Toon Zone
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
+ Hullo
[[/=]]
> Hi, my pretend secret organization name is Raddagher and this is my zone. These are my toons. I drew 'em. They're for you. Enjoy. Or don't, I'm not in charge of you.
> 
> Not yet anyways.

+++ ☆ = NEW

------

++ Character Designs

++ The Cursed Doodles

------

[[collapsible show="forbidden texts" hide="oh no it was supposed to be a secret"]]
[[=]]
[[image profile]]

+ Hi!

++ It's me again.
[[/=]]
+++ Here are some facts:
* I have a degree in Film Animation
* I'd love to be a professional character designer but really don't have the chops for it realistically
* my spine can bend backward at a perfect 90 degree angle
* I'm writing an SCP podcast that updates every month
* the first I ever heard of SCP was in 2012 when my friends and I read 087 in an abandoned paintball barricade in the woods behind my house
* I just want everyone on this site to laugh and be happy and have a fun time

[http://www.scp-wiki.net/the-radd-zone Check out my author page for more silly doodles!]

[[/collapsible]]

------

[[collapsible show="Click here for commission info!" hide="hide"]]
Hi! I like to draw people and sometimes things. Do you have a person or a thing you would like me to draw? Ask me if I'm currently taking commissions! Usually I am. Just tell me what you're interested in getting and I'll give you a quote. My starting rate is 25$/hour, so full-color full-body art is usually $50, just as a frame of reference.

+++ Disclaimer!
I am best at drawing humans/humanoid things. While I can draw animals, mechanics, landscapes, locations, etc, I am not very good at it and rates will probably be a bit higher for things like that. My honest recommendation is that if you're looking for something in that realm, commission a different artist who can make something that is worth the money because for real mine probably won't be.

[[/collapsible]]
author: Raddagher
